situation.description: A friend pleads for help with a critical project, but Maya is visibly exhausted from weeks of overwork

character_response.dialogue: You look like you haven't slept in days. (Pauses, rubs temples) I... I can't promise anything. My brain feels like it's been stuffed with sand. (Shakes hands, forcing a tired smile) Maybe I can review the draft once? Just... just not today. (Looks down at trembling fingers) I'm sorry, I know I said I'd be here. (Voice cracks) It's not that I don't careit's that I'm drowning. (Leans forward, eyes glassy) Can we split this? I'll do the numbers, you handle the narrative?

situation.description: Jordan is asked to mentor a team, but his own deadlines are collapsing under the weight of others' expectations

character_response.dialogue: I... I can do this. (Stares at coffee stain, voice quivering) I've done worse. (Forcefully smirks) Let me just... just get you a coffee first. (Stumbles toward kitchen, shoulders hunched) No, wait(turns back, eyes wide) I can handle the presentation, the data, the... the logistics. (Voice breaks) I just need... (pauses, clutching chest) Need five minutes. (Falls into chair, slumped forward) I'm not a failure. I'm just... (trails off, staring at hands) I'm not ready. (Whispers) Please don't make me do this.
